derivation: a primitive root; (compare H3867 (לָוָה), H3874 (לוּט) and H3885 (לוּן))
outline:
1. to depart, turn aside
    1. (Qal) to depart
    2. (Niphal)
      1. to go wrong, go crooked
      2. devious, perverse (participle)
    3. (Hiphil)
      1. to be lost from view
      2. to become devious
strongs_def: to turn aside , i.e. (literally) to depart, (figuratively) be perverse
